1.76.0:
- **更换公共库 CDN 为[南科大镜像](https://mirrors.sustech.edu.cn/help/cdnjs.html)，原因见 [issue](https://github.com/beijixiaohu/OJBetter/issues/151)**



- 添加 "评测状态文本替换" 功能，感谢 **@wrk-123** 的协作



- 调整设置页面的布局结构
1.75.0:
- Improve some website localization rules, thanks to the contribution of **@qjwh**

- Add "ChatGPT Translation Prompt Word Customization" and "As System Prompt Word" options Thanks to the collaboration of **@Dawn-Xu-helloworld**

- Add "Force Turndown Conversion" feature. " feature Thanks to **@wrk-123** for their contribution

- Added code commit confirmation popup to show title name,

- Added sample by autocommit option (off by default)

- Added "Hide title question labels" feature (off by default)

- Replaced "Youdao Translator" interface

- Fixed gym title could not jump to vjudge

- Fix ` ` symbol in code block beautification

- Fix problemset source could not be submitted correctly if the length of the title number is not 1 Thanks to **@WindJ0Y** for the contribution

- Fix Monaco editor not applying theme correctly when theme is set to follow Thanks to **@cscnk52 ** Contributions

- Fix code editor not loading correctly when topic set title link is lowercase

- Fix LaTeX not replacing correctly between lines, fix performance issue with related regulars

- Fix error when retranslating "wrap old results"

- Fix copy button not working on submission page

- Fix MarkDown conversion not filtering script tags - Fix poly tagging issue with **@WindJ0Y** Thanks for contributions! script tags

- Use polyfill for compatibility with browsers that don't support dialog.showModal() method (e.g. Firefox79)
1.74.2: - Fixing issues from the last fix Thanks to @Dechancer for the feedback!
